actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-413.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1234) to establish domestic content requirements for motor vehicles sold or distributed in interstate commerce in the United States.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1234 (motor vehicle domestic content requirements).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1234) to establish domestic content requirements for motor vehicles sold or distributed in interstate commerce in the United States.
